author: JonJo4781
title: Weekend in London -
text:
A really good place to stay if you're looking for a top of the range budget hotel. It's only two or three minutes walk from Euston Station. Clean, quiet room, no queue for meals and breakfast first class.
Room Tip: Ask for a room overlooking Duke Road. It's a quiet little used street. One side looks over Eusto... See more room tips
